briefdescription.para: Current batch step, alias for batchSize - 1.
Bias between the input and gate.
Weights between the cell and input gate.
Weights between cell and output gate.
Current gradient step to keep track of the backpropagate through time step.
Bias between the input and gate.
Weights between the input and gate.
Bias between the input and input gate.
Weights between the input and gate.
Bias between the input and gate.
Weights between the input and gate.
Weights between the output and forget gate.

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t inSize, const size_t outSize, const size_t rho=std::numeric_limits< size_t >::max())
memberdef.name: LSTM

briefdescription.para: Create the LSTM layer object using the specified parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum number of steps to backpropagate through time (BPTT).

briefdescription.para: Ordinary feed backward pass of a neural network, calculating the function f(x) by propagating x backwards trough f.

detaileddescription.para: Using the results from the feed forward pass.

briefdescription.para: Ordinary feed-forward pass of a neural network, evaluating the function f(x) by propagating the activity forward through f.

parameterdescription.para: Input data used for evaluating the specified function.

briefdescription.para: Ordinary feed-forward pass of a neural network, evaluating the function f(x) by propagating the activity forward through f.

parameterdescription.para: Input data used for evaluating the specified function.
Use the cellState passed in the LSTM cell.

briefdescription.para: Get the shape of the input.
Get the number of input units.
Get the number of output units.
Get the maximum number of steps to backpropagate through time (BPTT).
Modify the maximum number of steps to backpropagate through time (BPTT).
Get the size of the weights.
Implementation of the LSTM module class.

detaileddescription.para: The implementation corresponds to the following algorithm:

para.formula: \begin{eqnarray} i &=& sigmoid(W \cdot x + W \cdot h + W \cdot c + b) \\ f &=& sigmoid(W \cdot x + W \cdot h + W \cdot c + b) \\ z &=& tanh(W \cdot x + W \cdot h + b) \\ c &=& f \odot c + i \odot z \\ o &=& sigmoid(W \cdot x + W \cdot h + W \cdot c + b) \\ h &=& o \odot tanh(c) \end{eqnarray}

detaileddescription.para: Note that if an LSTM layer is desired as the first layer of a neural network, an IdentityLayer should be added to the network as the first layer, and then the LSTM layer should be added.
For more information, see the following.

simplesect.para: FastLSTM for a faster LSTM version which combines the calculation of the input, forget, output gates and hidden state in a single step.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the input data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
Type of the output data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
